metadata.title: Althara - Intelligence Layer for Operators
metadata.description: We read signals. We design private routes. We protect the edge.
metadata.keywords: intelligence, signals, briefings, operators, private routes, strategic routes

menu.dossiers: D O S S I E R S
menu.signals: S I G N A L S
menu.method: M E T H O D
menu.access: A C C E S S

hero.title: We operate in the non-visible layer.
hero.subtitle: We map what moves first: incentives, constraints, and quiet shifts.

caption.line1: What you see is not the work. It's the surface.

position.label: POSICIÓN
position.paragraph: Althara es una capa de inteligencia para operadores. No perseguimos tendencias. Anticipamos presión, timing y asimetría.
position.tab1_body: Inteligencia comprimida para operadores. No opinión: presión, timing y asimetría.
position.tab1_item2: Stress-test de escenarios y efectos de segundo orden.
position.tab1_item3: Ventanas de timing, triggers y restricciones.
position.tab2_body: Caminos privados de la intención a la ejecución—discreción, velocidad y palanca.
position.tab2_item2: Diseño de ruta: actores, acceso, dependencias.
position.tab2_item3: Cadencia de ejecución con mínima exposición.
position.tab3_body: Un marco que aguanta la ambigüedad. Decisiones ancladas a downside y asimetría.
position.tab3_item1: Árboles de decisión, umbrales y go/no-go.

trackRecord.label: TRACK RECORD (SELECTED)
trackRecord.footnote: We don't publish what we protect.

dossier2.title: Capital Gravity
dossier2.description: Why flows concentrate, then rewrite markets.

dossier3.title: Second-Order Demand
dossier3.description: When the real buyer isn't the user.

method.label: METHOD

phase1.title: CAPTURE
phase1.bullet1: We collect weak signals across systems.
phase1.bullet2: Noise is filtered. Patterns are kept.

phase3.title: MODEL
phase3.bullet1: We map causality and second-order effects.
phase3.bullet2: We look for timing, not opinions.

phase4.title: ROUTE
phase4.bullet1: We turn insight into action paths.

phase5.title: REVIEW
phase5.bullet1: We update the model as reality moves.

method.finalLine: We don't sell certainty. We build advantage.

quote1.text: They didn't give us answers. They gave us a map.

quote2.text: The value was timing. Not information.

quote3.text: Finally, a framework that respects privacy.

extract.line1: A short list of quiet shifts that precede demand.

finalCta.title: Access is curated.

subcopy.line1: If you operate where timing matters, request entry.

finalCta.microcopy: No spam. No public list. No noise.

footer.mantra: Lo grande no se anuncia. Se coordina

contactModal.title: Contacta con Althara
contactModal.description: Conectamos inversores y propietarios de activos premium de forma inteligente

messages.error: Error al enviar. Inténtalo de nuevo
